Description: Vase of pale brown marl pottery with a flat base, barrel-shaped body and narrow neck, terminating in an external roll-rim. Good condition.
Curator's comments: For the excavation, see E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, 'Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna' (London, 1911). Type most like Late ware L53G in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
